constraints.name: subset_weight_lower_bound
constraints.description: 选取的子集元素权重和不低于给定阈值
constraints.formal: sum(w_i for i in S) >= W

constraints.name: ratio_optimization
constraints.description: 最大化选取子集的特定属性比值（才艺值与重量比）
constraints.formal: maximize(sum(t_i for i in S) / sum(w_i for i in S)) where sum(w_i for i in S) >= W
